topicTitle: More efficient way to check steam id

posts.postText:
First, go into your community page and copy + paste your steam url. Mine, in this case, is this:

 http://i51.tinypic.com/54hykx.jpg 

With that, go to  http://www.noobsticks.com/home.php?pageid=lookup 

 http://i53.tinypic.com/2vc73go.jpg 

There you go. Your steam ID.
>> Same thing, yeah,  with a better looking layout and smaller, easier to remember url.
We already have a sticky for this.

>> We already have a sticky for this. 

Not in this section.
Cause its not needed in the Unban Request section imo.
But, they need your SteamID to unban, no?

I guess.... but why not just go into the game and find the steamid using status instead?

Its not like these players that require unban dont have access to the game right? Its more work doing this than it is going to a game and typing status in console.

Unlike the situation where we actually have to ban people that have left and our only way to get the info is by their id thingy.
